tool_description: We provide professional soccer tips with a high win rate.  Get tips from professional betting tipsters across all sports and offers from leading bookies
title: Soccer Betting Tips Pro

api_list.name: Ultra Tips Bet
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://soccer-betting-tips-pro.p.rapidapi.com/v1/global/gettipnow"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "soccer-betting-tips-pro.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
